name: Frydehr's Wrath
flavorText: Frydehr was near death, his wounds outnumbered only by his foes. It was then that he discovered that the depth of a crusader’s wrath is far greater than anyone had ever suspected.
flavorTextHtml: Frydehr was near death, his wounds outnumbered only by his foes. It was then that he discovered that the depth of a crusader’s wrath is far greater than anyone had ever suspected.

secondary.textHtml: Condemn has no cooldown and has its damage increased by 727%, but instead costs 40 Wrath. [600 - 800]%
